resources.string: This group is used to allow us to notify you of our services and to allow us to do said background work.

The Alert Service is a Foreground Service Component that requires a notification to be present for the app to be in the \"foreground\", this is to listen for Bluetooth events. You can block this category if you prefer, our service will still be operational.
This group allows us to alert you of state changes in Bluetooth.
Bluetooth State Alerts (e.g., Online, Offline, etc.)
We are passively listening for events. We will notify you of all events you chose to be notified about!
